title: ChatGPT â€” AI Tool Review
description: ChatGPT is OpenAI's flagship conversational AI that can answer questions, write code, draft content, analyze data, and assist with virtually any text-based task. ChatGPT is the world's most popular AI chatbot, developed by OpenAI. It uses large language models including GPT-4o to understand and generate human-like text. It can help with writing, coding, analysis, math, research, creative projects, and much more. Available as a free web app and iOS/Android app, with a Plus subscription for GPT-4 access. Highlights: Best-in-class natural language understanding. Massive plugin/GPT ecosystem. Free tier available. Strong coding and reasoning abilities. DALL-E 3 image generation included.
